sentences.english: Drought has caused major problems for boats that use the Xiangjiang River in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 干旱给通过湖南省湘江河的船只带来严重的问题。

sentences.english: Hengyang dialect and Changsha dialect belong to the same sub-xiang-dialects.
sentences.chinese: 衡阳方言与长沙话同属湘方言的一个次方言。

sentences.english: The Qidong dialect is a dialect spot in the Lou Shao dialect district of Hunan language family.
sentences.chinese: 祁东方言是湘语系娄邵片中的一个方言点。

sentences.english: Almost 170 vessels have been held up at the Zhuzhou section in the river's upper reaches.
sentences.chinese: 将近170艘船停在株洲地区，湘江河的上游河段。

sentences.english: Application of Verabav Flowmeter in the Test System of Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 威力巴流量计在湘钢检测系统的应用。

sentences.english: Gordon Wu won recognition for his progressive ideas of development a long time ago.
sentences.chinese: 胡应湘在工程和发展的超前理念，早获肯定。

sentences.english: Wang Kai Yun' Poetics is classical and different from the common custom poetics.
sentences.chinese: 湘绮诗学是一个与世俗诗学不同的古典诗学思想体系。

sentences.english: Mei extended his warm welcome to the delegation for an investigation tour here.
sentences.chinese: 梅克保对蒋至刚一行来湘考察表示欢迎。

sentences.english: Southeast Hunan lies on the margin of central Naning Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 湘东南地区位于南岭中段北缘。

sentences.english: This indicates Ningxiang dialect is a special inferior dialect in Hunan dialect.
sentences.chinese: 这说明宁乡方言是湘方言长益片里一个特殊的次方言。

sentences.english: Xiang Chu Culture"is the spiritual treasury of Hunan."
sentences.chinese: 湘楚文化是湖南人民精神财富的宝库。

sentences.english: The problems in the scrubbing water treatment system of converter flue gas of Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了湘钢转炉烟气除尘水处理系统存在的问题。

sentences.english: Invests successfully or not, direct relation Xianggang groups prosperity and decline success or failure.
sentences.chinese: 投资成功与否，直接关系到湘钢集团的兴衰成败。

sentences.english: Six Changsha municipal leaders including He Jianxiang were present at the review and approval meeting.
sentences.chinese: 市委副厅级干部何建湘等六人参加了这次评审会。

sentences.english: Achievements in scientific research of optimizing mixing coal of XISC in recent years is introduced in this papers.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了湘钢近年来所取得的优化配煤结构的科研成果。

sentences.english: The latest rapid uplift in southeast Hunan was a regional integral uplift.
sentences.chinese: 湘东南地区晚近时期的快速隆升是区域性整体抬升。
